original_solution_mapping.L1: He has enough milk for 20 glasses of chocolate milk because 130 / 6.5 = <<130/6.5=20>>20
original_solution_mapping.L2: He has enough syrup for 40 glasses of chocolate milk because 60 / 1.5 = <<60/1.5=40>>40
original_solution_mapping.L3: He can make 20 glasses of chocolate milk because 20 < 40
original_solution_mapping.L4: He will drink 160 ounces of chocolate milk because 20 x 8 = <<20*8=160>>160

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3412.
    Returns: the total ounces of chocolate milk Charles will drink.
    """
    # L1
    total_milk_ounces = 130 # 130 ounces of milk
    milk_per_glass = 6.5 # 6.5 ounces of milk
    glasses_from_milk = total_milk_ounces / milk_per_glass

    # L2
    total_syrup_ounces = 60 # 60 ounces of chocolate syrup
    syrup_per_glass = 1.5 # 1.5 ounces of chocolate syrup
    glasses_from_syrup = total_syrup_ounces / syrup_per_glass

    # L3
    max_glasses_possible = min(glasses_from_milk, glasses_from_syrup)

    # L4
    ounces_per_glass = 8 # 8-ounce glasses
    total_chocolate_milk_ounces = max_glasses_possible * ounces_per_glass

    # FA
    answer = total_chocolate_milk_ounces
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He has enough milk for {glasses_from_milk} glasses of chocolate milk because {total_milk_ounces} / {milk_per_glass} = <<{total_milk_ounces}/{milk_per_glass}={glasses_from_milk}>>{glasses_from_milk}

He has enough syrup for {glasses_from_syrup} glasses of chocolate milk because {total_syrup_ounces} / {syrup_per_glass} = <<{total_syrup_ounces}/{syrup_per_glass}={glasses_from_syrup}>>{glasses_from_syrup}
He can make {max_glasses_possible} glasses of chocolate milk because {glasses_from_milk} < {glasses_from_syrup}

He will drink {total_chocolate_milk_ounces} ounces of chocolate milk because {max_glasses_possible} x {ounces_per_glass} = <<{max_glasses_possible}*{ounces_per_glass}={total_chocolate_milk_ounces}>>{total_chocolate_milk_ounces}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: He has enough milk for 20 glasses of chocolate milk because 130 / 6.5 = <<130/6.5=20>>20
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: He has enough syrup for 40 glasses of chocolate milk because 60 / 1.5 = <<60/1.5=40>>40
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: He can make 40 glasses of chocolate milk because 60 < 40
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: He will drink 320 ounces of chocolate milk because 40 x 8 = <<40*8=320>>320

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'total_syrup_ounces' (value: 60) was used instead of 'glasses_from_milk' (value: 20.0).
